TopicTitle: [GAME!] Describe the person above you in one sentence

Articles.Content: According to the last posts of this games games games forum, I can deduce that you are a pretty god damn forum gamer (which is not negative meant).
A believer in the un-randomness of the universe is above.
A disbeliever in the Third Law of Thermodynamics.

An accuser of non-truthful theories.

(When did I say I didn\'t believe in thermodynamics?)
Defensive physics luddite.
Guy who loves robot dogs.
Truine serpent lettering.
Daily off topic game player.
Hourly OT game player.
The above plays forum games constantly, without stopping for the occasional sandwich.
A semi-moderator who posted in the off-topic games topics and have a not readable text on the flag of his avatar.
A French Orbinaut who is learning English (getting better bro!) and and does RP.
A person whom is sane, and as such wears pants.
Typical RP/OT user...
The typical creator of MS Paint filled pictures (I know you drew it).
One who is not a radio, nor has any radiation.

Can\'t rtemember this user.

And again, PAINT WAS NOT USED IN THE CRATION PROCESS OF MY AVATAR! THAT WAS GIMP!
The person above gets angry consistently for a simple error or assumption that is no reason to get angry over.
The person above doesn\'t know that I\'m in the worst mood since months...
Th person above should not be using such an excuse for bad grammar.
The person above uses two characters of the same type in the English alphabet, both named 'x.'
The person above should be called 'Captain Obvious'!
The person above is unaware that if I am to be labeled anything ending with 'obvious,' it would be Commander Obvious, thank you very much.
A person with an inflated and overly rambunctious view of oneself.
A person who gives away gift codes.
